snippet.title: New Pokemon Game With All Starters, Exp Share, Mega Evolution, Gacha Mode, New Story & More! [RPGXP]
snippet.description:
New Pokemon Game With All Starters, Exp Share, Mega Evolution, Gacha Mode, New Story & More! [RPGXP]
==============================================================

💎Pokemon Consonancia:- inspired by Pokémon Masters , is a game in which you will travel to Passio as a rookie trainer, there you will meet various characters from all the official deliveries together, from Kanto to Paldea , in addition to characters that the Masters brings with it such as Professor Margarita herself, you will participate in the WPM , a high-level tournament that seeks to determine the strongest trainer of all, to achieve this goal, you must improve as a trainer, but in addition, you must recruit different characters for your team, some of them will do so by story but many of them will depend on an RNG factor: The gachapón mode . It will not be easy to be the best, so testing strategies and team combinations will be essential!

🛑Features:
➡️Passio region completely imagined. (There are no routes or cities in the official game.)
➡️No Pokémon is left out, all 1025 will be obtainable!
➡️A multitude of Qols to try to make the experience as comfortable as possible.
➡️Gacha Mode: Over 60 characters will be available in the 3-star Gacha. (4- and 5-star Gacha will be with stronger Pokémon, not yet available.)
➡️Three types of speeds with the turbo.
➡️Official English voices of the characters, giving them greater vividness.
➡️All starters available from the start, so you can choose the one you like best.
➡️Distribute multiple Exp.
➡️Looped music to avoid cuts, much of it official from Masters himself.
➡️Gacha album to keep track of which characters you have in your collection.
➡️Mega Evolutions.
➡️A multitude of tools to face challenges, such as Paldea’s 229 TMs or all the competitive items up to 9th available.

⚠️PROGRESS:
Beta 1.2 - 10 hours of play approx.

💀DON'T CLICK THIS - https://bit.ly/3rRsj83

📚For More Info:
https://x.com/pkmnconsonancia/status/1819365032469094542

🎁Subscribe to stay tuned! - https://bit.ly/3rRsj83

🎈Leave a LIKE if you enjoy and have a great day!

⌛Join Our Discord - https://discord.gg/NS9E66U

🎯Download Link Of Game -
Please check the pinned comment!

💡This game is remade by @Pokemon Consonancia Team. and I downloaded it from x.com

💌For Business Inquiries:-
gohanstips72@gmail.com
